title: Sonorama - Music Band & Musician WordPress Theme
description:
Sonorama is a WordPress theme for music bands, profesional deejays, singers and for any artist related with the music industry that want to show his talent and sounds to the world.

Sonorama Wordpress Theme Features:
Visual Page Builder
Literally within minutes you can build complex layouts with drag and drop interface without touching a single line of code.


Embed audio & video content
Compatible with embeds (Soundcloud, Bandcamp, Youtube, Vimeo, and moreÃ¢â‚¬Â¦)


Neat and clean design
Clean, Modern Design can be used for any type of website


Infinite posibilites
With the advanced styling customization features, you can create endless possibilities by changing navigation styles, backgrounds for each section with colors, images or patterns.


Ultra Responsive
Sonorama is 100% responsive, each and every element including the awesome slider are fully responsive. Responsive Valid HTML5 and CSS3, Cross browser compatible


16 Predefined Color Styles
WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve included 16 ready-made skins in different color schemes for different purposes. They can be a great starting point for your unique custom design.


Modularity
Solido is like one big puzzle Ã¢â‚¬â€œ all elements of the site are designed highly modularly so you can build webpage and customize it according to your needs and taste.


Clean Code
The code is well written using the best resources available and also all the files are well commented to make your work much easier.


Retina ready
We have included retina display optimizations for all the main graphics used in the theme, so they look sharp on retina displays.


Parallax Sections
You can easily add 3D looking parallax backgrounds to every page sections.


Documentation
Our aim was to make your work with template easier so we created detailed documentation where you can find all the tutorials for working with Sonorama.


Browser Compatibility
Works and looks good on all major browsers, tablets and phones
